name: Outbreak (itch) (Argorath)
description:
This is my entry for the Godot Wild Jam 18, where the theme was plague.

You play as a person in a city where there has recently been an outbreak of the plague, the city has been put on lockdown to stop it from escaping the city. Plague doctor's roam the streets at night, if they spot you, you have to get back inside and try again. Try to avoid getting spotted and escape the city.
